fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Poor Fellow: If the Fool is ~~executed~~ lynched, then all those who voted to ~~execute~~ lynch them will lose 1 charge from all limited-use abilities. In addition, there can be no trials the next day.

fields.name: Note:
fields.value: Troll Box is removed. In the goal, "executed" should be "lynched."

fields.name: Objective:
fields.value: Convince others that YOU are guilty of treason; get yourself ~~executed~~ lynched.
